name: Helayu Katupila Tea
description: ‘Helayu Katupila tea’ is an ideal herbal tea produced using 100% naturally extracted ‘Katupila’ herb which is a natural antidote for healing wounds. Also, this herbal tea contains the ability to fight against cancer and is an exact treatment against discomfort in the urinary trat, menstrual disorders and seminal weaknesses.*Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
